page.title: 20Tamar Valley _ Credits
page.content:
The Tamar Valley area was researched by the following members of the St. Dominic Women's Institute, which lies approx 1.5 km north of the block.
Mrs.{Joan Dyke,}President Mrs.{Diana Axtell,}Secretary Mrs.{Catherine Wilkinson Mrs.{Deirdre Verran Miss{Jane Grimwood
We are indebted to Mr{Leslie Morcom}of Pensilva for the set of accompanying slides, to{Robert Verran}of St.Dominic for technical assistance, and to the following for their co-operation:
Lt.Col{Peter Ferguson,}Halton Barton Mr{Charles Huntington-Whitely,}of the Pentillie Estate Mr{Edward Andreae-Jones,}Hole's Hole Mrs{Virginia Spiers}of the TPS.
